parameter.name: alwaysIncludeEmail
parameter.description: Whether to always include a value in the 'email' field for the organizer, creator and attendees, even if no real email is available. The default is False

parameter.name: maxAttendees
parameter.description: The maximum number of attendees to include in the response.

parameter.name: maxResults
parameter.description: Maximum number of events returned on one result page.

parameter.name: originalStart
parameter.description: The original start time of the instance in the result.

parameter.name: pageToken
parameter.description: Token specifying which result page to return.

parameter.name: showDeleted
parameter.description: Whether to include deleted events in the result.

parameter.name: timeMax
parameter.description: Upper bound (exclusive) for an event's start time to filter by.

parameter.name: timeMin
parameter.description: Lower bound (inclusive) for an event's end time to filter by.

parameter.name: timeZone
parameter.description: Time zone used in the response.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.
